info.name: Drokpa V1 API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Drokpa V1 - Tours, Homestays, Bookings, Payments, and ILP Onboarding

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Himalayan Trek Adventure",
  "description": "Experience the majestic Himalayas with guided trekking",
  "type": "TREK",
  "price": 50000,
  "duration": 5,
  "imageUrls": [
    "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/image2.jpg"
  ],
  "maxCapacity": 15,
  "included": [
    "Meals",
    "Accommodation",
    "Guide"
  ],
  "notIncluded": [
    "Travel to base",
    "Insurance"
  ],
  "highlights": [
    "Mountain views",
    "Wildlife spotting",
    "Culture immersion"
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Mountain View Cottage",
  "description": "Cozy cottage with panoramic mountain views",
  "houseRules": [
    "No smoking inside",
    "Quiet hours after 10 PM",
    "Checkout by 11 AM"
  ],
  "safetyNSecurity": [
    "24/7 CCTV",
    "Safe for valuables",
    "Emergency contact available"
  ],
  "imageUrls": [
    "https://example.com/homestay1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/homestay2.jpg"
  ],
  "displayPrice": 5000,
  "bookingCriteria": "PER_NIGHT",
  "email": "host@example.com",
  "phoneNumber": "+919876543210"
}

{
  "name": "Rahul Singh",
  "languages": ["English", "Hindi"],
  "experience": 5,
  "expertise": ["Trekking", "Cultural Tours"],
  "ratePerDay": 2000,
  "latitude": 32.2396,
  "longitude": 77.1887,
  "bio": "Experienced guide with passion for mountains"
}
